issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I discovered that if you create a launch configuration and attach a user data file under the advanced option, the file does not get executed when the instance boots.  However, if you copy text directly from the user data file and paste it into the text box, it does work.  I have attached a screen shot showing the launch configuration attach user data screen after the file is selected.  This happened while using the eucalyptus/admin login.
fields.summary: User data not working through launch configuration, launch instance, and launch more instances if you attach a file

comments.body: [~ccassler]: Does this also affect the launch instance wizard, or is it limited to the launch configuration wizard?
[~ccassler], [~alice]: Looking at the code, this appears to affect the launch instance wizard, the create launch config wizard, and the "launch more like this instance" form.

Fixed in https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/742

[~viglesias], [~ccassler], [~alice], [~tjcramer]: Note that the issue and the fix affects the launch instance wizard, the create launch config wizard, and the "launch more like this instance" page.  Although the fix is safe and sound IMO, there is a fairly heavy QA burden.  Nevertheless, I recommend we include this fix in 4.0 since the issue is fairly serious.

[~viglesias], [~alice], [~ccassler], [~tjcramer]: Tested the fix on the launch instance wizard, the launch config wizard, and the launch more instances page, testing with file upload and with the user data text area field populated (as separate test cases).  I'm confident the fix in pull request 742 resolves the issue and does not introduce regressions.  I've also asked [~kyolee] to help test this tonight.

[~kyolee]: Here are the cases we need to test…

1. Create launch config wizard with user data file upload field populated and user data textarea blank
2. Create launch config wizard with user data textarea populated and file upload field blank
3. Create launch config wizard with user data textarea and file upload field blank

Repeat the above for the launch instance wizard and the launch more like this instance page.

I've tested each of these cases (on Safari 6.1.3 on Mac OS 10.8.5) and they all appear to work fine with the fix in pull request 742
[~kgill], yes we should get this fix in in 4.0.

[~kgill] 

The fix looks obvious enough. I will test tonight as well but want to make sure [~alice]  is okay with it before the commit goes in.
Oops didn't see [~alice] comment. Let's go for it.
[~kgill], [~viglesias] I will pull in new packages tonight and test the fix as well.
Tested on Chrome and Firefox on OS X. Able to launch instance with user data via the input text box and the file upload, using both the instance launch wizard and the launch configuration setup.
Tested on FF, user data looks good in launch instance wizard, launch more like this and launch config.
Tested from Instance wizard, Launch more like this and from Launch Configuration wizard.  All of them worked.
